bannerSpecialOffers.heading: Kids Special
bannerSpecialOffers.text: Low impact paintball great for kids. 2 hours slot with an inclusive half hour party slot after the games

bannerSpecialOffers.heading: Covid £30 deal
bannerSpecialOffers.text: We're now open and due to cornoavirus restrictions we're offering a special deal of £30pp for a half day

specialOfferDetails.heading: Covid £30 deal
specialOfferDetails.text: We're now open and due to cornoavirus restrictions we're offering a special deal for just £30pp for a half day. Including 400 paintballs, Mask, Hood, Gun, Ammo belt and Clean coverall. All funds must be paid one week in advance to reserve a game.
